noblePhantasms.name: Crying Warmonger
noblePhantasms.detail: Deal heavy DEF-ignoring damage to all enemies ▲ + greatly restore your HP ▲ <effect increases with Overcharge>

comments.comment:
Height/Weight: 221cm, 165kg
Origin: History
Region: Rome
Alignment: Neutral-Balanced
Gender: Male
He emits the aura of an abnormal person from
his entire body.

Spartacus was a gladiator from ancient Rome, and the leader of the slave war known
as War of Spartacus. The rebellion was crushed, but his name was engraved in history as the hope of those oppressed.

Spartacus summoned as a Berserker at first
seems to possess proper thought. He eloquently speaks complex language, and does not assault his Master. However...

Madness Enhancement: EX
Even after Madness Enhancement, Spartacus
can hold a proper conversation.
But as he always "chooses the most difficult option," it is actually quite impossible to get through to him.

『Crying Warmonger』
Rank: A
NP Type: Anti-Personnel (Self)
Howl of the Wounded Beast.
A Noble Phantasm that is always active. Converts damage taken from enemies
into magic energy to store. If the amount of magic energy stored is too great, it will ultimately morph his appearance.

For the time being, he will accompany his Master. But if his Master shows even the slightest attitude that they are "like a Master," he is sure to immediately plan a rebellion. Even the bindings of Command Spells will have little effect, and he will
become a troublesome opponent.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle: What a blessing to celebrate your birthday, Master.

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle: Something seems to be happening, Master. Let's go.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle: There's no need for Master and Servants. All people are equal.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle: What do I like? Rebellion. That is everything to me.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle: What is unforgivable? I will eternally despise oppressors. They should all die.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle: The Holy Grail... Yes, the arena. Nothing can be done. As long as I continue to rebel, that wish will continue to come true.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hahaha, you can't hurt this body without doing at least that much.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Whatever you do will be futile.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle: You will free the oppressed with me! Let's go!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle: We are all equal. I despise those who do not understand that. You seem to understand. Thank you. Just thank you.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text:
I am Berserker Spartacus.[r]
Sorry to ask this, but are you a tyrant?
voiceLines.subtitle:
I am Berserker Spartacus.
Sorry to ask this, but are you a tyrant?

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Oppressor! I shall not embrace you!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: My love shall destroy all oppressors.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: The rebellion is about to begin. Prepare yourself.

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: It goes without saying... My rebellion is eternal and indestructible.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Nothing feels better than protecting the weak.

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Uugh... I'll repay this ecstasy... twofold...

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 700500_0_B050]Hahahahahahahaha! 
[id 700500_0_B051]Let's go.
[id 700500_0_B052]My love is going to explode!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 700500_0_B800]Rebellion is truly my life.
[id 700500_0_B801]Ah, you oppressors in the distance... [id 700500_0_B802]Take up your blades and try to destroy me!
